Articles.Content:
Hello, im playing in career mode (my first career) and i got the delta wings.

With the delta wings, i always crash in the launchpad (dont know the name ), always going to the left or right, and i dont know how to fix it :/ I need to finish investigating kerbin

Thanks!

-Ghost

Edited June 13, 2014 by Ghostexx7
Answered

Pictures?

It may help fill in what you are unable to.
Are you launching vertically from the launch pad (like a rocket) or horizontally from the runway (like a plane)?

I guess you mean the left-right wobbling of an aircraft driving down the runway?

If that is the problem your having consider lowering your center of mass (bring it closer to the ground).

And place your landing gear under the wings instead of placing them under the hull of the aircraft, this will improve stability a lot.

Edit: You should enable steering on the front wheels as well.
Enable SAS before you begin your takeoff run, it'll help to hold you on-course down the runway.
